LanguageData.PsychicDroneLow.label: psychic drone (low)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneLow.description: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
LanguageData.PsychicDroneMedium.label: psychic drone (medium)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneMedium.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
LanguageData.PsychicDroneHigh.label: psychic drone (high)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneHigh.description: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!
LanguageData.PsychicDroneExtreme.label: psychic drone (extreme)
LanguageData.PsychicDroneExtreme.description: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
